item.title: Lift off! We have a lift off
item.description: That’s right I have launched blog and this is my first post. Hopefully I will be posting here on regular basis. I will try to focus on different technical areas like DevOps, Back-end engineering, Cloud computing, IoT and SpaceX/NASA exploration. Wish me luck and stay tuned!
